title: An Act establishing a special commission on a statewide long-term services and supports benefit program

abstracts.abstract: Senate, October 16, 2025 -- The committee on Aging and Independence to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 476) of Patricia D. Jehlen for legislation to establish a special commission on a statewide long-term services and supports benefit program, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2645).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Aging and Independence
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
